--- title: Graph tools keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Functions for general graph manipulation and property checking" ---

Utilities¶

non_pendant_edges[source]

non_pendant_edges(G)

Returns all non pendant edges of a graph G

is_pendant[source]

is_pendant(G, edge)

Checks if edge is pendant in the graph G

has_isolated_nodes[source]

has_isolated_nodes(G)

Checks if the graph G has isolated nodes
